Register Test:
Silicon Labs IEC60355 class b test script log
provides execution log of the BIST and POST register Program Counter (PC) test function

executed : 11:18:05, 11.07.2011
System frequency : 32 MHz

This test checks the functionality of the POST register test
testing program counter (PC) CPU register.

POST test
This Test doesn't inject any failures.
BIST test
	test result : PASS

	execution cycles : 415
	execution time   : 0.000013 sec

BIST test
This Test doesn't inject any failures.
POST test
	test result : FAIL

	execution cycles : 164
	execution time   : 0.000005 sec
